metadata.title: P2P Meeting - Secure Peer-to-Peer Video Meetings
metadata.description: Host and join video meetings directly between participants without storing data on servers. Fast, secure, and private P2P video communication.

common.pleaseEnterCode: Please enter the 6-digit verification code shown on the sender's device:

home.title: P2P Meeting
home.heroDescription: Direct peer-to-peer video meetings with multiple participants. Your video and audio never touch our servers - completely private and secure.
home.noServers: No servers, no data collection, just you and your team.
home.lightningFastDesc: Direct Peer-to-Peer connection ensures the lowest possible latency for your calls.
home.manageMeetingRoomsDesc: Create persistent meeting rooms with fixed links. Perfect for recurring team syncs, client meetings, or family hangouts.
home.createDescription: Host a new meeting room and get a QR code and link to share with participants
home.joinDescription: Scan a QR code, enter a meeting code, or use a link to join an existing meeting
home.featurePrivateDesc: Video and audio are streamed directly between participants. Nothing stored on our servers.
home.featureNoLimitsDesc: Unlimited meeting duration and participants. Host meetings as long as you need.
home.featureMultiParticipantDesc: Connect with multiple people in a single meeting room. No limits on participants.
home.featureEasyConnectionDesc: Just scan a QR code to join. No accounts, no apps to download.

join.title: Join Meeting
join.enterMeetingCode: Enter the meeting code shown on the host's screen
join.shareCodeForVerification: Please share this code with the host for verification:
join.verificationCodeSent: ✅ Verification code sent to host. Waiting for them to approve...
join.hostMustApprove: The host must approve this code to establish a secure connection
join.enableCameraMic: Enable camera and microphone to join the meeting
join.cameraMicRequired: Camera and microphone required • No account needed
join.connectionTerminated: The connection has been terminated. Please get a new meeting code to join again.
join.description: Enter the room ID and your name to connect.

host.title: Host Meeting
host.askParticipantsToJoin: Ask participants to scan this QR code or enter the meeting code
host.askParticipants: Ask participants to scan this QR code or enter the meeting code
host.shareCodeWithParticipants: Share this code with participants to join manually
host.shareCode: Share this code with participants to join manually
host.copyLinkDescription: Copy this link to send to participants
host.pleaseEnterVerificationCode: Please enter the 6-digit verification code shown on the participant's device:
host.enterVerificationCode: Please enter the 6-digit verification code shown on the participant's device:
host.ensuresRightParticipant: This ensures you're admitting the right participant
host.verificationDescription: This ensures you're admitting the right participant
host.connectionTerminated: The meeting has ended. You can start a new meeting by refreshing.

qrCode.scanWithAnyScanner: Scan with any QR code scanner or camera app

errors.noActiveConnection: No active connection. Please verify the connection first.
errors.verificationFailed: Verification failed - please check the code and try again
errors.invalidMeetingCode: Invalid meeting code - please check and try again
errors.failedToEnableMedia: Failed to enable camera and microphone

logs.lookingUpPeerId: Looking up peer ID from short code
logs.foundPeerId: Found peer ID from short code
logs.receiverReady: Receiver ready, waiting for sender connection
logs.onlyReceiverCanSubmit: Only receiver can submit verification code

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your persistent meeting rooms
dashboard.createFirstRoom: Create your first room to get started. Share the link once, use it forever.

room.title: Meeting Room
room.hostPasswordPlaceholder: Enter only if you are the host
room.waitingForHostText: You are in the lobby for
room.scanDescription: Scan this QR code with your mobile camera to join
room.sharingNotSupported: Sharing not supported on this device
room.hostNotOnline: Host is not online yet. Cannot join lobby.
room.waitingForHostOnline: Waiting for host to come online...
room.fallbackToRoomId: Falling back to using room ID as meeting code
